channel.title: How the hell do you block this guy!
channel.description: omg this fuck face keeps crashing my server i can't ip bann him cuz he changes ip as you can see on the pic below he fills server up with nulls look [URL=http://img407.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fuckingbitchcz3.jpg][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/8171/fuckingbitchcz3.th.jpg[/img][/URL][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 12:03:02 PM[/size][hr]any ideas?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 12:03:48 PM[/size][hr]everytime i turn it gone there he goes crashing my server once again anyone know? =\[br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 12:05:04 PM[/size][hr]anyoone :p

item.title: How the hell do you block this guy!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“aftereffect, post:1, topic:145506”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=199241.msg1773722#msg1773722 date=1190503848]

[quote author=aftereffect link=topic=199241.msg1773712#msg1773712 date=1190503667]

Then he needs to add the correct way of getting rid of him.

Him? I’m talking about the pinger crashing his server.
[/quote]So am i?

It’s not a person, it’s a crasher. Whoever is using it, just types his ip and port into the cmd prompt, and it pings the hell out of his server. Which creates a shit load of nulls.
[/quote]But a person is using it.[/quote]

Alot use it, and it’s a simple fix, to where they just waste their time, and make thier computer slow for no reason.

Read full topic
item.source: How the hell do you block this guy!

item.title: How the hell do you block this guy!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Lol, you’re using my source, which is really bad. He’s pinging your ip, which creates nulls on that shitty source. It’s about 5 lines of code to fix it, but you didn’t even bother to change the name, or learn.
